posts.post_content: Graded or raw is fine. Have around an $80 budget. Thanks!
I'm in competition with you on this one! Love the restaurant in Covington!

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=2113745]I'm in competition with you on this one! Love the restaurant in Covington![/QUOTE]

Agreed! I used to live in Ft Thomas and my fiancee and I would go all the time. Fantastic smoked wings.

I managed to find a raw one about a month ago in rough shape, so I'm hoping to upgrade even a little bit. Found a dude selling a PSA 4 for $180 which is unfortunately outside of my price range.
I wonder if the restaurant has any copies? They would look great back by all that bourbon

[quote name="BuckiGuy" post=2115857]I wonder if the restaurant has any copies? They would look great back by all that bourbon[/QUOTE]

Great question.  If they don't, they need one ASAP.  I've been messing around on eBay trying to find team photos of him too but finding a specific minor league team from a specific year is tough.
